title: [Large-scale] Short-Term Intensive Expert Course in Science Using Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and foundational professional competencies
context.additional_context: Professional training programs for medical/legal/technical experts. Operated primarily through standardized learning management systems rather than learner-driven tool utilization.

learning_goals: Establish and execute a self-directed learning plan of five or more hours per week using a Learning Management System (LMS)
Acquire 80% or more of core concepts in science through microlearning content delivered in mobile environments
Conduct real-time formative assessments using an evaluation system at least twice weekly to reduce individual learning gaps by 30%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
